item.title: Car abandoned on zig zag white lines outside a school, 12th December
item.description:
This car has been abandoned here and last night was the cause of an incident due to a pedestrian's vision being obscured at the end of the school day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
